attributes.action: Stop energy companies hiking prices up and refund customers for the past months
attributes.additional_details:
The likes of British Gas, Eon and many more are refusing to pause prices to which is now doubling per day, the government must take action on this because it’s unfair whilst in a pandemic.

There are people with young families who are trying to cope and heat their homes, yet the energy firms won’t listen.

They should be made to refund customers for the past three months minimum for what the charges have been.
attributes.background:
Energy prices have risen in the last few months meaning that everyone has been choosing to either ‘Heat or Eat’

This is diabolical in the stresses of a pandemic, Energy firms should be made to reimburse customers

This needs to end now across all energy providers and we capped.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The cost of energy is a matter for energy companies, while the energy price cap is a decision for Ofgem.
